Author: Tony Crisci
Comment:
Well right now, the only way to run a command is by generating json, and then parsing the result if you want to check for errors.

If conserving cpu cycles is a goal, then this is a good optimization.

I will use this in the code that runs bindings and it will knock off ~100 lines of code off src/key_press.c and be reused for mouse bindings.
